snippet: “Marc Chagall,” an exhibition running through Nov. 4 at the Nassau County Museum of Art, celebrates the work of a reluctant mystic and an anomaly in the modern-art canon.
abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews paintings by Marc Chagall at the Nassau County Museum of Art in Roslyn Harbor, NY (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: “Marc Chagall,” an exhibition running through Nov. 4 at the Nassau County Museum of Art, celebrates the work of a reluctant mystic and an anomaly in the modern-art canon.

headline.seo: A Review of ‘Marc Chagall,’ at the Nassau County Museum of Art
headline.main: Vibrant Postcards From an Inner World
headline.print_headline: Vibrant Postcards From an Inner World
